data.name: NO RELOADING
data.detailed_description:
Has this ever happened to you? You’re a sentient robot traversing the galaxy looking for dog food for your favorite pooch, when a bunch of nasty goblins dognap your best friend and wreck your ship? Then you have to fight wave after wave of the goblin horde, just to get your dog back? We’ve all been there, right?

If this doesn’t ring a bell, get ready: the adventure you’re embarking on is a single-player shooter featuring cinematic action, irreverent humor, and one simple rule: NO RELOADING.

Free Prologue!

Play the free demo to experience a taste of all the stylish kick-assery you can do!

A Robot with Swagger

You are Roger, a robotic wanderer with all sorts of fantastical technologies including totally overpowered tractor-beam arms and legs. You’re a bit of a wise-ass, but you’re good with a gun and aren’t afraid to fight dirty… listen, whatever it takes to rescue your only friend in the universe from goblin clutches, amiright?

Stylish Mayhem

These goblins just keep coming so there’s no limit to the punishment you can inflict upon these intergalactic dognappers: throw ‘em against the wall, shoot ‘em with their own gun, blow ‘em to smithereens… sky’s the limit. As you accrue abilities, you will soon become an unstoppable force, capable of sliding, stomping, grabbing, throwing, and even slowing down time itself!

Environmental Destruction

Wanna break some stuff? We got hundreds of hand-crafted, interactable, destructible props and environment pieces for you to take out your aggression. Throw kitchen knives at enemies, launch a cargo crate into a security bot's cranium, explode questionable containers of fluid, and more! Go ahead and start smashing, we guarantee you’ll feel better.

Dynamic Encounters

Goblins aren’t known to be the brightest pickles in the patch (read: they’re dumb), but when working together, they can be surprisingly adept! Prepare to face off against legions of baddies from lowly security guards to berserker warrior gods, security drones to massive war mechs and more… hey, it’s a big galaxy with a lot of nasty things in it.

Quit stalling!

What are you waiting for? A formal invite? Play the free demo now… your doggy needs you!

Just remember… NO RELOADING!

data.short_description: NOBODY STEALS YOUR DOG... AND LIVES. You are outnumbered, outgunned, and out-goblin'd. Steal weapons and equipment from these wannabe dognappers and shoot, slide, stomp, slice, and dodge your way through a time-bending, ass-kicking adventure. Just remember... NO RELOADING!

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7 or Higher
  • Processor: 2 Gigahertz Dual Core or Better
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Any NVIDIA or ATI graphics card after 2016.
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 400 MB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
